name: v2.13.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Adding CentOSStream and PhotonOS by @garethgreenaway in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/pull/392
* Fix image parser when output includes a duration timestamp by @RulerOf in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/pull/390
* Update test suites by @RulerOf in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/pull/388
* Release 2.13.0 by @ashiqueps in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/pull/394

## New Contributors
* @garethgreenaway made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/pull/392
* @ashiqueps made their first contribution in https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/pull/394

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/test-kitchen/kitchen-docker/compare/v2.12.0...v2.13.0
